channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer

item.title: CVE-2017-17541|2024-08-05T20:51:32.239Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimanager%2C%20fortianalyzer
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fortinet FortiManager 6.0.0, 5.6.4 and below versions, FortiAnalyzer 6.0.0, 5.6.4 and below versions allows inject Javascript code and HTML tags through the CN value of CA and CRL certificates via the import CA and CRL certificates feature.
